  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020514</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020514</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La expansión de Roma (509-133 a.C.)</string>
            <string language="en">The expansion of Rome (509-133 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Expansion Roms (509-133 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'expansion de Rome (509-133 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A expansão de Roma (509-133 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'espansione di Roma (509-133 B.C.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επέκταση της Ρώμης (509-133 B.C.)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Breve texto explicativo de la expansión de Roma desde comienzos de la República hasta el s. II, con mapa, imágenes, ventana desplegable y enlaces a glosario.</string>
            <string language="en">Brief text explaining the expansion of Rome from the beginning of the Republic to the second century B.C. which includes a map, images, a pop up window and links to a glossary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">expansión</string>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurzer Text, der die Expansion Roms vom Anfang der 
Republik dem zweiten Jahrhundert B.C. beschreibt, das eine Karte, 
Bilder, einen Knall herauf Fenster und Links zu einem Glossar 
einschließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bref texte expliquant l'expansion de Rome du début de la 
République au deuxième siècle B.C. qui inclut une carte, des 
images, un bruit vers le haut de fenêtre et des liens à un 
glossaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Texto breve que explica a expansão de Roma do começo da 
república ao segundo século B.C. que inclui um mapa, imagens, um PNF
acima da janela e as ligações a um glossário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Breve testo che spiega l'espansione di Roma dall'inizio 
della Repubblica al secondo secolo B.C. che include un programma, le 
immagini, uno schiocco sulla finestra ed i collegamenti ad un 
glossario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνοπτικό κείμενο που εξηγεί την επέκταση της Ρώμης 
από την αρχή της Δημοκρατίας στο δεύτερο αιώνα που Π.Χ. 
περιλαμβάνει έναν χάρτη, τις εικόνες, ένα λαϊκό επάνω 
παράθυρο και τις συνδέσεις με ένα γλωσσάρι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expansão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espansione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επέκταση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
